text: How did trading change my life? Well, it's really simple because in the beginning I thought it was going to be Make a lot of money fast and you find out pretty quick. It's not that But if you endure and persist you start to reap the benefits and the way that it changed my life for some foremost is It allowed me to retire my mom That was my biggest motivating factor for starting this whole thing is because I knew that she didn't have a retirement in place She was going to need help and I needed it to be in a position to help her Then if you take it a step after those needs are met Trading is so beautiful because it provides Opportunity it provides you true freedom to be able to make decisions because you're not beholden to other things Now that being said, it's not easy and that's the tricky part for trading is that people are Miss led into thinking it's easy and it is not but it's worth it being out of sale later You
